ygData.subject: Was:Practicing with... Now:Dancing
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve always thought of it as dancing , and all my guildmates are jealous when I do it  :o)~ ... From: Elijah Meeker  To: eqbards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
I've always thought of it as "dancing", and all my guildmates are jealous
when I do it :o)~
-----Original Message-----
From: Elijah Meeker <elijah@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, September 06, 1999 1:24 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Practicing Wind with Mino Horn


>From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
>> Yes, it does. I use the mino horn exclusively for all the wind songs I
>> have, because I hate that silly marching animation you get with the
flute.
>> My wind skill is maxed for my level.
>
>"Marching" I like that, I will use it. *laughs* However, I doubt anyone in
>MY group is going to buy a descriptive word of the animation that isn't
>"prancing" or "frolicking like a little wood elf" *sigh* which, BEING a
>little wood elf, is a hard one to dispute. at least there is inviso. How
>humiliating for a rough and tumble, macho battle bard like Tszaaz who
taunts
>Cinder Goblin Wizards back to the waiting tanks and endures all they can
>throw at him...
>
>*sigh*
>*prance*
>
>Tszaaz E'Taurguin
>
>
